generated.css: body{font-family:sans-serif;background-color:#f2f0ef;color:#6f5270;padding:0;margin:0;font-size:16px}header{min-height:30vh;width:100%;display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center;position:relative}.logo{position:absolute;top:5vh;width:33vw;z-index:1}.header-background{position:absolute;left:0;top:0;width:100%;height:100%;z-index:10}.header-background img{height:100%;position:static}.header-background-left,.header-background-right{position:absolute;z-index:2;width:50%;height:100%;background-color:transparent;background-position:50%;background-size:cover}.header-background-left{top:0;left:0}.header-background-right{top:0;right:0;display:flex;justify-content:flex-end;align-items:flex-end}.header-background-left img{height:75%}.header-background-right img{height:60%}.header-content{display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center;z-index:10}.header-content h1{text-align:center;font-weight:600;max-width:80vw;margin-top:20vh;margin-bottom:3rem;font-size:9vw}.header-content button{margin-top:3rem;margin-bottom:3rem;background-color:#fff;border:none;outline:none;color:inherit;padding:1.5rem 3.5rem;border-radius:12px;box-shadow:0 3px 6px 1px hsla(0,0%,70.2%,.25882352941176473),1px 1px rgba(163,142,142,.2196078431372549);font-size:3.75vw}#Services{margin-top:5vh}.services-wrapper{display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center;align-items:center;padding:5vw}.services-wrapper h1{font-size:6.5vw;text-align:center}.services-wrapper article{background-color:#fff;border-radius:5vw;box-shadow:0 3px 6px 1px hsla(0,0%,70.2%,.25882352941176473),1px 1px rgba(163,142,142,.2196078431372549);padding:6vw 9vw 9vw;margin:4rem 0}.services-article-content,.services-wrapper article{display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center}.services-article-content{justify-content:center}.services-article-content h2{font-size:5vw;text-align:center;margin:0}.services-article-content p{font-size:4vw;text-align:center;line-height:1.6}.services-article-content button{background:none;outline:none;font-size:4vw;color:inherit;border:3px solid #6f5270;border-radius:15px;width:40%;padding:1.25rem 0}#Values{margin-top:5vh;display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center}#Values h1{font-size:6.5vw;max-width:90vw;text-align:center;margin-bottom:10rem}#Values article{margin-bottom:15rem}#Values article,.values-article-heading{display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center}.values-article-heading{align-items:center}.values-article-heading img{width:11vw}.values-article-heading h2{font-size:5vw}.values-article-content{display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center;align-items:center;text-align:center}.values-article-content p{font-size:4vw;padding:0;margin:0 0 4rem;max-width:80vw;line-height:1.6}.values-article-content button{background:none;outline:none;font-size:4vw;color:inherit;border:5px solid #6f5270;border-radius:15px;width:40%;padding:1.25rem 0}footer{background-color:#fff;width:100%}.footer-socials{display:flex;align-items:center;flex-direction:column;margin-bottom:7.5rem}footer h1{font-size:5vw}ul{margin:0;padding:0;list-style:none;display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center}li{padding:0 4vw}li img{width:6vw}.footer-copyright p{text-align:center;font-size:2.5vw;margin:0;padding-bottom:3rem}@media (min-width:768px){header{min-height:70vh}.logo{width:25vw}.header-content h1{font-size:8vw}.header-content button{font-size:2.5vw}#Services h1{font-size:4vw;max-width:70vw}.services-articles-wrapper article{flex-direction:row;justify-content:space-between;padding:1rem 3rem}.services-article-content{margin-left:7vw;max-width:50%;align-items:flex-start}.services-article-content h2{font-size:2.75vw;align-self:flex-start}.services-article-content p{max-width:80%;font-size:1.75vw;text-align:left}.services-article-content button{width:90%;font-size:2vw}.services-article-alt{flex-direction:row-reverse!important}}
